name: Brik-Blox
description:
Be Brave! Get to breaking blocks of bricks in this 3D interpretation of a retro classic!

Be Bold! Built with fun and challenging puzzle-like levels that become more brutal as each wall is broken.

Brick Break! Get to bragging and breakthrough the leaderboards to become the best brick breaker!

Boasting over one hundred levels, Brik-Blox is all about bouncy balls and breaking bricks. Boost your destruction skills with multiple action packed power-ups. Everything from explosive balls to increasing its speed there are many power-ups to find.

Beware of your angles an beat each level which contain up to five types of tricky bricks! Everything from bricks that explode to ghost bricks that remain invisible until hit. But the trickiness doesn't stop there.

As you progress the difficulty of each level increases as does your addiction to boss each one! Get to brick breaking with Brik-Blox!

Features:

0 bland ads to keep you bemused
5 Types of bricks
11 Super Power-Ups
100+ Levels
Easy to play
Simple, Intuitive controls
Original music by ASH, the Artist
